trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Lawton
There were no other sightings in Lawton on or around August 16th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailswe were sitting at a stoplight, and noticed a reflection from the sun. I started to watch it. At first I thought it was a reflection from the sun on to an airplane. Saw the side of the object, it was extremely shiny like a mirror, and was turning north. It proceeded north going slow at first then sped up. It was white at this time, and it had no wings, no tail of an airplane. It was a small craft. I live next to a military base and haven't seen this before. As it sped away, don't know if it disappeared or if it just went to fast to noticed.
